sentences.en: " There'll be just one brief skirmish and the Yankees will skedaddle back into Tennessee.
sentences.cn: " 只要打一次小小的遭遇战,北方佬就会逃回田纳西去的.

sentences.en: A Senate race in Tennessee last year exposed more complex racial currents.
sentences.cn: 去年田纳西州的一场参议院竞赛暴露出更为复杂的种族趋势.

sentences.en: After hard fighting, nearly all of Tennessee was now held by the Union troops.
sentences.cn: 经过激烈的战斗, 田纳西几乎已全部落入北军的手中.

sentences.en: And the Yankees had been driven out of Georgia, back into Tennessee.
sentences.cn: 结果北方佬被赶出佐治亚, 退回到田纳西去了.

sentences.en: Big dams were built across the Tennessee river and its tributaries.
sentences.cn: 在田纳西河及其支流上都修建了大型水坝.

sentences.en: Davy Crockett was born on August 17 th, 1786 in eastern Tennessee.
sentences.cn: 大卫?克洛基在一七八六年八月十七日出生于田纳西州东部.

sentences.en: Let freedom ring from Lookout Mountain of Tennessee!
sentences.cn: 让自由的回声响彻田纳西州的卢考特山吧!

sentences.en: Many people in Minnesota and Tennessee have noticeable regional accents.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达州和田纳西州的许多人都有明显的地区口音。

sentences.en: Most of the other citizens in Tennessee disagreed with him. They decided to leave the Union.
sentences.cn: 然而，在田纳西州，绝大多数人都反对他的决定，他们决定脱离合众国。

sentences.en: Perhaps Mr Sarkozy should pay a visit to Chattanooga , Tennessee.
sentences.cn: 也许Sarkozy应该去造访一下田纳西的 扎塔努加市.

sentences.en: Records of 224 plots in Tennessee are being used to test and revise this method.
sentences.cn: 在田纳西州的224个样品的记录正用于检验和修订.

sentences.en: She He moved to Tennessee from California about a year ago.
sentences.cn: 他大约在一年前从加利福尼亚迁到了田纳西.

sentences.en: TEP ( Tennessee - Eastman Process ) is used to produce the emulational data.
sentences.cn: 用田纳西 - 伊斯曼过程TEP ( Tennessee-Eastman Process ) 平台产生仿真数据,并利用Matlab软件 建立故障检测与诊断模型.

sentences.en: The next day, after Al and I went for a jog in Little Rock, we flew to his hometown, Carthage, Tennessee, for a rally and a visit with his parents, both of whom had a large influence on him.
sentences.cn: 第二天，艾尔和我一起在小石城里慢跑了一下，然后我们飞到他的家乡田纳西州的迦太基，参加一个集会，并拜见他的父母。 他的父母对他影响非常大。

sentences.en: The President - elect visited the Tennessee Valley in company with Norris.
sentences.cn: 在诺里斯的陪同下,这位当选总统视察了田纳西河流域.

sentences.en: The study at the University of Tennessee selected 169 married couples under the age of 35 and asked them to fill in questionnaires every six months for four years.
sentences.cn: 田纳西州大学的这项研究选取了169对35岁以下的已婚夫妇，在四年的时间里每隔6个月请他们填一份调查问卷。

sentences.en: The Tennessee State Police are holding him.
sentences.cn: 田纳西州警察局拘留了他.

sentences.en: What impressed me more was that she knew Tennessee Williams.
sentences.cn: 让我印象更深的是她认识田纳西·威廉斯。
